search_general_talk_05/4401_1031_0200_10:
Maybe he doesn’t
think I’m worthy...
search_general_talk_05/4401_0701_0100_10: Seriously, where did Torchic run off to?
search_general_talk_05/4401_0701_0200_10:
I’m not really confident in my skills as a Trainer...
What if Torchic doesn’t think I’m a good partner?
search_general_talk_05/4401_0701_0300_10:
Um...[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Can I ask you a favor?
search_general_talk_05/4401_0701_0400_10:
While we’re searching for Torchic, do you think
you could give me some tips on how to become
a better Pokémon Trainer?
search_general_talk_05/4401_0702_0500_10:
If I gain some more confidence, maybe Torchic
will finally acknowledge me.
search_general_talk_05/4401_0702_0600_10:
I’m sure I could learn so much from you and
your partner, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Will you help me? Please!
search_general_talk_05/4402_0701_0100_10:
You want to know how to be better friends with
your Pokémon? Well, for starters, you can’t be
uncertain or anxious.
search_general_talk_05/4402_0701_0200_10:
Pokémon can tell when their Trainer is feeling
out of sorts.
search_general_talk_05/4402_0701_0300_10:
You’ve got to brush off that negativity,
walk right up to the Pokémon you want
to befriend, and then—
search_general_talk_05/4402_0701_0400_10: Ahhh! Yesss... What a sweetie you are!
search_general_talk_05/4402_0702_0500_10:
I know it looks like she bit me, but she didn’t.
She’s just showing me affection.
search_general_talk_05/4402_0702_0600_10: There, see? Look at what good friends we are!
search_general_talk_05/4403_1031_0100_10:
Where has my poor,
sweet Torchic gone?
search_general_talk_05/4403_1031_0300_10:
Come back, Torchic!
I promise I’ll do better!
search_general_talk_05/4403_0701_0100_10:
Torchic is actually the first partner Pokémon
I’ve ever had.
search_general_talk_05/4403_0701_0200_10: He’s so small and cute. I love him to bits!
search_general_talk_05/4403_0701_0300_10:
But I get scared and run away every time I see
a strong Trainer.
search_general_talk_05/4403_0701_0400_10:
My lack of confidence probably makes things a lot
harder for Torchic... No wonder he doesn’t listen
to anything I say.
search_general_talk_05/4403_0702_0600_10:
Did you hear that?! It’s Torchic! He’s calling
for me! I shouldn’t be moping around like this.
search_general_talk_05/4403_0702_0700_10:
I need to be better and try my hardest—just like
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Wish me luck!
search_general_talk_05/4404_0701_0100_10: Man, ain’t she a piece o’ work! Sheesh!
search_general_talk_05/4404_0701_0200_10:
When I was her age, I’d duke it out with any
Trainer I saw—no matter how strong they looked.
search_general_talk_05/4404_0701_0300_10:
What she needs is to buck up and fight a bunch
o’ different sync pairs! Grow some...guts, if ya
know what I mean!
search_general_talk_05/4405_0701_0100_10:
Hm? You want to know about the bond I have
with my Pokémon? Well, we actually started off
as partners at work.
search_general_talk_05/4405_0701_0200_10:
Bulbasaur’s always had an easygoing nature,
and I’m his super-perfectionist polar opposite.
We were never in sync...and it showed.
search_general_talk_05/4405_0701_0300_10:
I figured the best way to get in sync with
Bulbasaur would be to get to know him
much, much better.
search_general_talk_05/4405_0702_0400_10:
So I did! We went out on the weekends together,
hung out, and just spent more time together
in general.
search_general_talk_05/4405_0702_0500_10:
Before I knew it, we understood each other
like we never had before—and we’d become
the best partners ever!
search_general_talk_05/4601_0701_0100_10:
Come on—you’re a Rising Star! Calm down, and
take a deep breath! You can do this!
search_general_talk_05/4601_0701_0200_10:
How many times have I told you to be bold,
have confidence—
search_general_talk_05/4601_0701_0300_10:
Wh-what? I’m n-n-not doing anything weird
or s-s-suspicious at all! Nope!
search_general_talk_05/4601_0701_0400_10:
See that g-girl over there? I’m kinda like her
mentor... So I’m just trying to keep an eye on
her, OK?
search_general_talk_05/4601_0701_0500_10:
You look like you could help her grow as a
Trainer... Here, take this!
search_general_talk_05/4601_0702_0100_10: Just don’t tell her you saw me, OK?
search_general_talk_05/4501_0701_0100_10:
Phew! Man, it feels good to be out of that
dark cave and back in the sunshine!
search_general_talk_05/4501_0701_0200_10:
Yodel-ay-hee-hoo! Hey, you over there!
You’re out here for some Pokémon battlin’
today, aren’t you?
search_general_talk_05/4501_0701_0300_10:
Feels like days since I last saw another human!
Let me yodel y’all a fightin’ song to boost your
morale! Yodel-ay-hee-hoo!
search_general_talk_05/4501_0702_0100_10:
Gahaha! Now y’all are ready for any challenger
comin’ your way! Good luck!
